scripts.pre-build: npm run prettier && npm run lint
scripts.start: npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/app.js
scripts.start-dev: npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node dist/app.js
scripts.test-one: npm run prettier && npm run lint:write && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require @babel/register src/**/*.test.js --recursive -g <NAME_OF_THE_TEST>
scripts.test: npm run prettier && npm run lint:write && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require @babel/register src/**/*.test.js --recursive && npm run test-coverage
